name: Indentured Operator
description:
How to Play the game:

WASD - Movement
Spacebar - Interaction

1. Interact with the Ticket Machine.
2. Remember the ticket number.
3. Interact with the correspending Plug terminal.
4. Connect according to the ticket, from left to right.
5. If you make a mistake you lose points. If you succeed, you gain points!
6. Get as many connections before the end of the day. TRANSMIT THOSE CALLS!

Tip: Walking over cables slows you down.
